original_text: And the Babylonians came to her into the bed of love, and they defiled her with their whoring lust. And after she was defiled by them, she turned from them in disgust.
korean_text: 바벨론 사람이 나아와 연애하는 침상에 올라 음행으로 그를 더럽히매 그가 더럽힘을 입은 후에 그들을 싫어하는 마음이 생겼느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Babylonians came to her
And after she was defiled by them
she turned from them in disgust
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 그들을 혐오하여 그들에게서 등을 돌렸습니다
